LanguageData.OHUAlbatros.label: OHU Albatros
LanguageData.OHUAlbatros.description:
The OHU Albatros: A lightweight glider used for gentle travel. Very fuel efficient over long distances
Passenger cap: 2 Speed: 2 tile/hr Fuel capacity: 500L Fuel efficiency: 1 fuel/tile Cargo capacity: 300kg
LanguageData.OHUAlbatros_Active.label: OHU Albatros active
LanguageData.OHUAlbatros_Incoming.label: OHU Albatros incoming
LanguageData.OHUAlbatros_Leaving.label: OHU Albatros leaving
LanguageData.OHUDropship.label: OHU Dropship
LanguageData.OHUDropship.description:
The OHU Dropship: A sturdy all-purpose aircraft with a focus on cargo capacity and range.
Passenger cap: 20 Speed: 15 tile/hr Fuel capacity: 4000L Fuel efficiency: 1 fuel/tile Cargo capacity: 8000kg
LanguageData.OHUDropship_Active.label: OHU Dropship active
LanguageData.OHUDropship_Incoming.label: OHU Dropship incoming
LanguageData.OHUDropship_Leaving.label: OHU Dropship leaving
LanguageData.OHUKestrel.label: OHU Kestrel
LanguageData.OHUKestrel.description:
The OHU Kestrel: A smaller variant of the regular dropship. Limited cargo area and passenger seats and high fuel consumption are compensated by increased speed.
Passenger cap: 2 Speed: 30 tile/hr Fuel capacity: 2000L Fuel efficiency: 7 fuel/tile Cargo capacity: 2500kg
LanguageData.OHUKestrel_Active.label: OHU Kestrel active
LanguageData.OHUKestrel_Incoming.label: OHU Kestrel incoming
LanguageData.OHUKestrel_Leaving.label: OHU Kestrel leaving
